text: Satpura Range is one of the most prominent mountain ranges in India. It is spread like that, on it's south Tapi river and on it's north large Narmada river is flowing, it generally spread most part from eastern in Madhya Pradesh and towards western Nandurbar district in Maharashtra. It also rich in biodiversity and generally consists of indigenous tribes. Toranmal hill station is most prominent in Satpuras. Its altitude higher in west and gently slope eastwards. Category:Hills of Asia Category:Madhya Pradesh Category:Maharashtra
title: Satpura Range
